title: Can You Hear Me?
creator_credit: Impact Films, New South Wales. Coal Board and John Fitzgerald
brief_description: How to protect our amazingly sensitive hearing from the hazard of noise at the workplace. Animation and live action reveal detail of the inner ear where excessive noise can cause permanent deafness. A guideline allows workers to assess dangerous noise levels where ear protection must be worn. Shows adverse social consequences of noise deafness, with straight answers from a doctor.
